column2: HOUSE IS CLEAR I REPEAT HOUSE IS CLEAR. WE GOT CASUALTIES. SEND IN THE MEDIC DOWN HERE NOW. OVER.
HOUSE IS CLEAR I REPEAT HOUSE IS CLEAR. OVER.
I GUESS WE DID IT GUYS!
I GUESS WE SCREWED THIS UP BIGTIME, HUH?
SPEC OPS TEAM AT THE LOCATION. READY TO ENGAGE. OVER.
THEY BROUGHT OUT TWO CIVILIANS FEW MINUTES AGO AND LINED UP THEM IN THE FRONT DOOR.
BE ADVISED IT LOOKS LIKE THE TANGOS ARE ARGUING ON SOMETHING. LEADER LOOKS NERVOUS. OVER.
I HAVE A GOOD SHOT HERE. I CAN TAKE HIM OUT CLEAN, REQUEST PERMISSION TO FIRE. OVER.
HOLDING FIRE, THATS A COPY PAPA BEAR. OVER.
SHOTS FIRED SHOTS FIRED. THE LEADER IS KILLING THE CIVILIANS!
PAPA BEAR TO SNIPERS. SPEC OPS TEAM IS ENROUTE. CAN YOU REPORT THE SITUATION AT TARGET LOCATION, OVER.
NEGATIVE SNIPER ONE. DO NOT FIRE I REPEAT DO NOT FIRE UNTIL CLEARED. DO YOU COPY. OVER.
GREEN LIGHT GREEN LIGHT. YOU ARE CLEARED TO FIRE. STORM THE BUILDING AND NEUTRALIZE THE TANGOS. GO GO GO!
